pci_projects_project_creating_main_title: Youâ€™re on your way to the Public Cloud
pci_projects_project_creating_explain1: To finalize the creation of your project, please make the payment of the order form {{ orderId }}.
pci_projects_project_creating_explain2: If this page still appears a few minutes after you have submitted your payment, please contact our customer services team.
pci_projects_project_creating_not_paid: It seems that you have an order form for {{amount}} of credits pending, we invite you to settle it by clicking on "Finalize my order" to start creating your project.
pci_projects_project_creating_not_paid_e: By clicking on "Finalize my order" you will be redirected to an order form that you will have to pay by the payment method you have chosen.
To find your invoice, go to "My account", then " My orders ".
